attributes.additional_details:
We are moving this to a UK Gov petition site to force a debate, please help us: 

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/03/31/half-a-million-people-join-justice-for-chunky-anti-animal-abuse/ 

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3455063/Half-million-call-national-animal-cruelty-register-plight-tortured-dog-hands-teenage-gang-triggers-Justice-Chunky-campaign.html
attributes.background: In 2015 as a puppy, Chunky was beaten and left for dead. Chunky survived, the attackers got a five-year ban.  We would like the UK government to ensure that anyone who buys an animal is checked for previous animal abuse history through an Animal Cruelty Register.
